RxML.TEXT: <gender>Female</gender> <age>19-24</age> <treatment_length>1 to 6 months</treatment_length> <satisfaction>1</satisfaction> <effectiveness>4</effectiveness> <condition>Condition: Birth Control</condition> <comment>I started taking Birth control for exactly that reason. While I was on Junel FE I turned into a completely different person. I was moody aggressive and depressed. I also gained at least 40 pounds on it. as soon as i stopped taking it I turned back into my self again. I would not recommend this Birth Control to any one.</comment>
